mema samuluwa dina dekaka thakshanika sasiwalin samanwitha wu athara ehidi naya apa aawarana paddhathin sandaha dijitalkaranaye balapama, naya purakakaranayan hi nawothpadanayan saha thirasara mulya thulin mulya anthargathabhawaya athi kirima yana mathruka pilibandawa piliwelin jose farnandu figiyiredo mahatha - sabhapathi, kshudra, sulu ha madhya parimana wyaparikayan sandaha wana krushirakshana saha anyonya naya apa aawarana sangamaya - pruthugalaya, aacharya dabliw.

masa kihipayak yana thuruma api ekineka dana haduna gaththa kiwwoth hari...aya pilibanda purna wishwasayak thabimata haki bawa thahawuru kara gath pasuwa, mamada ayada edineda jiwithaye siddha wena siyaluma de beda gannata dewarak hithuwe na...api boho wita wiweka sanda wala muhudu werale ohe thorathonchiyak nathi katha bahakin awida giya..eeth aa thula thibunu samahara gathi harima amuthuyi.....eewa pirimi gathi kiyala wen karala haduna ganna puluwan tharam hari pahadili...age adum palandun pawa pirimi aareta nima wela thibuna bawa danunath ee gana wimasimak karanna mata oona kamak thibune na....aa ithamath aacharashili suhada charithayak yaluwekta sudusu gunanga aa sathu wuna.
ee sandaha janadhipathi maithripala sirisena haraha nimal siripala wipaksha nayakawaraya wetha pamini yojanawata shri lanka nidahas pakshaye manthriwarunge da anumathiya labi thibina.
api ithin kohen kiyala ewa dilit korannada..ne..onna ithin ada mama genawa supiri bandayak...godak aya meka gana dannawa..
